-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | ICU transliteration
--   
--   Bindings to the transliteration features by the International
--   Components for Unicode (ICU) library
@package text-icu-translit
@version 0.1.0.7


-- | This module provides the bindings to the transliteration features by
--   the ICU (International Components for Unicode) library.
--   
--   <pre>
--   &gt;&gt;&gt; IO.putStrLn $ transliterate (trans "name-any; ru") "\\N{RABBIT FACE} Nu pogodi!"
--   ğŸ° ĞÑƒ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸!
--   </pre>
--   
--   <pre>
--   &gt;&gt;&gt; IO.putStrLn $ transliterate (trans "nl-title") "gelderse ijssel"
--   Gelderse IJssel
--   </pre>
--   
--   <pre>
--   &gt;&gt;&gt; IO.putStrLn $ transliterate (trans "ja") "Amsterdam"
--   ã‚¢ãƒ ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ«ãƒ€
--   </pre>
--   
--   More information about the rules is <a>here</a>.
module Data.Text.ICU.Translit
data Transliterator

-- | Construct new transliterator by name. Will throw an error if there is
--   no such transliterator
trans :: Text -> Transliterator

-- | Transliterate the text using the transliterator
transliterate :: Transliterator -> Text -> Text
